sin_inverse.title: Principal Value Branch of y = sin⁻¹x
sin_inverse.svg: <svg viewBox='-1.5 -2 3 4' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='background:#fff; border:1px solid #eee; max-width:300px; display:block; margin:0 auto;'><line x1='-1.5' y1='0' x2='1.5' y2='0' stroke='#333' stroke-width='0.05'/><line x1='0' y1='-2' x2='0' y2='2' stroke='#333' stroke-width='0.05'/><path d='M -1 -1.57 Q -0.5 -1.57 0 0 Q 0.5 1.57 1 1.57' stroke='#8e44ad' stroke-width='0.1' fill='none'/><text x='1.1' y='0.3' font-size='0.3' font-family='sans-serif'>x</text><text x='0.1' y='1.8' font-size='0.3' font-family='sans-serif'>y</text><text x='-1.2' y='-1.6' font-size='0.2' fill='#8e44ad' font-family='sans-serif'>y=sin⁻¹x</text></svg>

cos_inverse.title: Principal Value Branch of y = cos⁻¹x
cos_inverse.svg: <svg viewBox='-1.5 -0.5 3 3.5' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='background:#fff; border:1px solid #eee; max-width:300px; display:block; margin:0 auto;'><line x1='-1.5' y1='0' x2='1.5' y2='0' stroke='#333' stroke-width='0.05'/><line x1='0' y1='-0.5' x2='0' y2='3.5' stroke='#333' stroke-width='0.05'/><path d='M 1 0 Q 0.5 0.5 0 1.57 Q -0.5 2.6 -1 3.14' stroke='#e74c3c' stroke-width='0.1' fill='none'/><text x='1.1' y='-0.2' font-size='0.3' font-family='sans-serif'>x</text><text x='0.1' y='3.3' font-size='0.3' font-family='sans-serif'>y</text><text x='0.5' y='2.5' font-size='0.2' fill='#e74c3c' font-family='sans-serif'>y=cos⁻¹x</text></svg>

tan_inverse.title: Principal Value Branch of y = tan⁻¹x
tan_inverse.svg: <svg viewBox='-3 -2 6 4' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' style='background:#fff; border:1px solid #eee; max-width:300px; display:block; margin:0 auto;'><line x1='-3' y1='0' x2='3' y2='0' stroke='#333' stroke-width='0.05'/><line x1='0' y1='-2' x2='0' y2='2' stroke='#333' stroke-width='0.05'/><line x1='-3' y1='1.57' x2='3' y2='1.57' stroke='#ccc' stroke-dasharray='0.2' stroke-width='0.03'/><line x1='-3' y1='-1.57' x2='3' y2='-1.57' stroke='#ccc' stroke-dasharray='0.2' stroke-width='0.03'/><path d='M -3 -1.4 Q -1 -1.2 0 0 Q 1 1.2 3 1.4' stroke='#2980b9' stroke-width='0.1' fill='none'/><text x='2.5' y='0.3' font-size='0.3' font-family='sans-serif'>x</text><text x='0.1' y='1.8' font-size='0.3' font-family='sans-serif'>y</text><text x='-2' y='1' font-size='0.2' fill='#2980b9' font-family='sans-serif'>y=tan⁻¹x</text></svg>
